trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"> </xref> hendelser i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When you create an ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
